cookies.title: Google Session Cookies
cookies.description:
Automated browser login is not available on this platform. You can authenticate in one of two ways:

**Option A – Single cookie value (easiest)**
1. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** in your browser and log in.
2. Open DevTools (F12) → Application → Cookies → `https://accounts.google.com`.
3. Find the cookie named `__Secure-1PAPISID` and copy its value.
4. Paste it into the **__Secure-1PAPISID cookie value** field below.

**Option B – Full JSON export**
1. Install a cookie-manager extension such as **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)** in Chrome or Edge.
2. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and log in.
3. Click the extension icon and choose **Export as JSON**.
4. Paste the JSON into the **Session cookies (JSON)** field below.

data_description.papisid: The value of the `__Secure-1PAPISID` cookie from accounts.google.com. Use this as a simpler alternative to exporting the full cookie JSON.
data_description.cookies_json: Full JSON cookie array exported from your browser (e.g. via Cookie-Editor). Used when providing the full cookie context. Leave empty if using the __Secure-1PAPISID field above.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate – Session Expired
reauth_confirm.description:
Your Google Family Link session has expired. Provide fresh credentials from **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** using one of the two options below.

**Option A – Single cookie value (easiest)**
Copy the `__Secure-1PAPISID` cookie value from DevTools (Application → Cookies → `https://accounts.google.com`) and paste it below.

**Option B – Full JSON export**
Install **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)**, export cookies as JSON from families.google.com, and paste below.

data_description.papisid: The value of the `__Secure-1PAPISID` cookie from accounts.google.com.
data_description.cookies_json: Full JSON cookie array exported from your browser. Leave empty if using the __Secure-1PAPISID field above.
